## Branch Strategy

```
     main                    gxq                   Vercel
       â”‚                      â”‚                       â”‚
       â”‚                      â”‚                       â”‚
   [commit] â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

       â”‚â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€>â”‚â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€>â”‚
       â”‚                      â”‚                       â”‚
       â”‚                      â”‚                       â”‚
   [commit] â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
       â”‚         auto sync    â”‚        auto deploy    â”‚
       â”‚â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€>â”‚â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€>â”‚
       â”‚                      â”‚                       â”‚
       â”‚      <PR created>    â”‚                       â”‚
       â”‚<â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”‚                       â”‚
       â”‚                      â”‚                       â”‚
```

## Key Points

### ðŸ”µ What Developers Do
1. Make changes locally
2. Test with `npm run dev`
3. Commit and push to `main`
4. **That's it!** Everything else is automatic

### ðŸŸ¢ What Happens Automatically
1. GitHub Actions detects push to main
2. Syncs all changes to gxq branch
3. Creates/updates PR for review
4. Vercel deploys from gxq branch

### ðŸŸ¡ What Gets Deployed
- All 10 webapp pages
- All UI/design updates
- All feature changes
- All configuration updates

## Timing

```
Push to main
     â”‚
     â”œâ”€ [30s] GitHub Actions starts
     â”œâ”€ [60s] Sync to gxq completes
     â”œâ”€ [10s] PR created
     â”œâ”€ [90s] Vercel build starts
     â”œâ”€ [120s] Vercel build completes
     â””â”€ [10s] Deployment live
     
Total: ~5 minutes from push to live
```

## File Changes Tracked

```
webapp/
  â”œâ”€â”€ app/                   âœ… Synced
  â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ page.tsx          âœ… Synced
  â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ swap/             âœ… Synced
  â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ sniper/           âœ… Synced
  â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ launchpad/        âœ… Synced
  â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ airdrop/          âœ… Synced
  â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ staking/          âœ… Synced
  â”‚   â””â”€â”€ arbitrage/        âœ… Synced
  â”œâ”€â”€ components/           âœ… Synced
  â”œâ”€â”€ lib/                  âœ… Synced
  â”œâ”€â”€ public/               âœ… Synced
  â”œâ”€â”€ next.config.ts        âœ… Synced
  â”œâ”€â”€ package.json          âœ… Synced
  â””â”€â”€ ... all other files   âœ… Synced
```

## Success Indicators

### âœ… Workflow Succeeded
- Check mark in GitHub Actions tab
- gxq branch updated with latest commit
- PR created/updated with changes
- Commit message in gxq branch history

### âœ… Deployment Succeeded  
- Green check in Vercel dashboard
- New deployment URL active
- Changes visible on live site
- No build errors in logs

## Troubleshooting Quick Reference

| Issue | Solution |
|-------|----------|
| Workflow not starting | Push to `main` branch, not other branches |
| Build failing | Test locally: `cd webapp && npm run build` |
| Vercel not deploying | Check root directory is set to `webapp` |
| PR not created | Check GitHub Actions permissions |
| Changes not visible | Wait for deployment (~5 min), hard refresh |

---

**For technical details**: See [WORKFLOW_DOCUMENTATION.md](WORKFLOW_DOCUMENTATION.md)
